Jina Valentine (amụrụ n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1979, na Berwyn, Pennsylvania) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri nke ógè a nke ọrụ ya na-agwa site na usoro na atụmatụ nke ndị America na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-eji usoro mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche emepụta akụkọ ihe méré eme gụnyere eserese, ime akwụkwọ, collage ihe achọtara, na nchekwa ihe.
Valentine nwetara MFA na Mahadum Stanford mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Pennsylvania na California College of the Arts
Ọ natara BFA na Mahadum Carnegie Mellon ma gụọ akwụkwọ na France na Lacoste School
Valentine bi na Chicago, ebe ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè Printmedia nà School of the Art Institute of Chicago. Na mbụ, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè nka na UNC Chapel Hill

Valentine egosila na ebe ndị gụnyere The Drawing Center, Studio Museum na Harlem, CUE Foundation, Elizabeth Foundation, Patricia Sweetow Gallery, Fleisher-Ollman Gallery, Marlborough Gallery, Ogilvy Gallery, na 21C Museum Hotel (Durham, North Carolina).

O sonyere na ébé óbíbí na Atlantic Center for the Arts, Women's Studio Workshop, Sculpture Space, Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculptura, Santa Fe Art Institute, na Cité internationale des arts na Paris.

N'afọ 2011, Valentine bipụtara Ticket to the Unknown, nsụgharị nke ọrụ nké onye na-ese ihe na Switzerland Aloise Corbaz. E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke Steffani Jemison's Future Plan and Program, ọrụ iji bipụta akwụkwọ édémédé site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe na-acha.
Ọ natara Joan Mitchell MFA Grant, San Francisco Arts Commission Fellowship, na Creative Capital Emerging Fields Award. E gosipụtakwara nka ya n'ihu Southern Cultures, Summer 2015.
Valentine na ónyé na-ese ihe Heather Hart guzobere The Black Lunch Table na 2005. Ọrụ na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta ihe ndekọ ọnụ, salons na Wikipedia edit-a-thons.
